titles.title: WIN 5G Act

To provide for a transition process to make electromagnetic spectrum between the frequencies of 3700 megahertz and 4200 megahertz available for allocation and auction, to make available Federal spectrum for non-Federal use or shared Federal and non-Federal use, and for other purposes.
WIN 5G Act
Wireless Investment Now in 5G Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

bill.summary:
Wireless Investment Now in 5G Act or the WIN 5G Act
This bill addresses wireless network technology, including by requiring the Federal Communications Commission to designate a transition facilitator (i.e., an organization consisting of all satellite operators providing mid-band spectrum) to create a transition plan for reallocating mid-band spectrum.
